Package server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    This class handles the information about an Activity object.
    ActivityRegister
    This class creates a register that handles Activity objects.
    Buffer<T>
    Buffer class
    ReceiverServer
    This class creates a thread pool and handles the communication from the Client.
    SenderServer
    This class creates a thread pool and handles the communication to the Client.
    ServerController
    This class handles the logic of the in and out coming objects from the clients.
    SocketStreamObject
    This class handles a socket and the input/output streams.
    StartServer
    This class creates a server-object and starts the server.
    User
    This class handles the information about a user-object.
    UserRegister
    This class handles all the user objects.
    UserTimer
    This class handles the information for a user's timer.
